dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3968234J] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, May 06, 2007 12:23 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3968234J] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE Added by system at Sunday, May 6 2007 05:21 pm X-MailFrom: barbara.steinberg@sulake.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun May 6 17:21:14 2007 Received: (qmail 1363 invoked by alias); 6 May 2007 22:21:14 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 1360 invoked from network); 6 May 2007 22:21:14 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 6 May 2007 22:21:14 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 6 May 2007 17:21:14 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sun, 06 May 2007 17:21:14 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from barbara.steinberg@sulake.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Hkp6Q-0003Tb-EK for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 06 May 2007 17:21:14 -0500 Received: from punk.sulake.com ([193.64.35.198] helo=mail.sulake.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from barbara.steinberg@sulake.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hkp6M-0001rF-PN for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 06 May 2007 17:21:11 -0500 Received: from localhost (mail.sulake.com [193.64.35.194]) by mail.sulake.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id D4F653FBDD for ; Mon, 7 May 2007 01:21:06 +0300 (EEST) Received: from mail.sulake.com ([193.64.35.195]) by localhost (punk [193.64.35.195]) (amavisd-new, port 10024) with ESMTP id 23344-09 for ; Mon, 7 May 2007 01:21:06 +0300 (EEST) Received: from barbara (host-64-139-235-32.nctv.com [64.139.235.32]) (using TLSv1 with cipher RC4-MD5 (128/128 bits)) (No client certificate requested) by mail.sulake.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 6B4443FBBC for ; Mon, 7 May 2007 01:21:05 +0300 (EEST) Message-ID: <02ab01c7902c$b317f140$0201a8c0@barbara> From: "Barbara Steinberg" To: Subject: COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE Date: Sun, 6 May 2007 18:20:04 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_02A8_01C7900B.2AC8EF40" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2800.1409 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1409 X-Virus-Scanned: amavisd-new at sulake.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 May 2007 22:21:14.0697 (UTC) FILETIME=[DBFB0390:01C7902C] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir/Madam, A Network Lookup listed your name as the host of this site, which is infringing on our copyright. habbo-hotel-cheats.com I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright for http://www.habbohotel.com.uk. The owner of this copyright is Sulake UK Ltd. www.habbohotel.co.uk is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and cheques. Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus: 'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake UK Ltd. All rights are reserved.' I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this website is not authorised by Sulake UK Ltd, the copyright owner, or the law. I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this under penalty of perjury. I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected. Yours sincerely, Barbara Steinberg Community Safety Assistant Manager Sulake Corporation MIME element (text/html)
 
Dear Sir/Madam,

A Network Lookup listed your name as the host of this site, which is infringing on our copyright.
 

habbo-hotel-cheats.com


I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the
copyright for http://www.habbohotel.com.uk. The owner of this copyright is
Sulake UK Ltd.

www.habbohotel.co.uk is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for
teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is
represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in
all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by
the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users
purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as
credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and
cheques.

Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus:
'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this
website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake UK Ltd. All
rights are reserved.'

I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this
website is not authorised by Sulake UK Ltd, the copyright owner, or the
law.

I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that
I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this
under penalty of perjury.

I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from
your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected.

Yours sincerely,

Barbara Steinberg
Community Safety Assistant Manager
Sulake Corporation

 
MIME element (text/plain)
